member.name: T:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner
member.summary: DialogueRunner Script.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialogueStarted
member.summary: Event fired when the dialogue is started.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialogueRestarted
member.summary: Event fired when the dialogue is restarted.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialogueStopped
member.summary: Event fired when the dialogue is stopped.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialoguePaused
member.summary: Event fired when the dialogue is paused.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialogueResumed
member.summary: Event fired when the dialogue is resumed.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.DialogueEnded
member.summary: Event fired when there are no more choices or lines to continue to.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.NewDialogueLine
member.summary: Event called when a new dialogue line exists.

member.name: E:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.NewDialogueChoices
member.summary: Event called when a new choice is present.

member.name: P:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.IsPaused
member.summary: Whether the story is paused.

member.name: P:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.IsStoryActive
member.summary: Whether there is an active story present.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.StartDialogue(FlaxEngine.JsonAssetReference{FlaxInk.InkStory},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Start the dialogue.
member.param: The ink story in Flax JSON format to start.
Whether to call Continue dialogue immediately.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.StartDialogue(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Start the dialogue.
member.param: The story in JSON format to start.
Whether to call Continue dialogue immediately.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.StartDialogue(Ink.Runtime.Story,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Start the dialogue.
member.param: Whether to call Continue dialogue immediately.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.ResetDialogue
member.summary: Uses the same story, but resets all the data and starts at the beginning.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.GoToStartOfStory
member.summary: Keeps existing story state and data but moves the dialogue back to the start.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.PauseDialogue
member.summary: Pauses the dialogue and does not let it continue until resumed.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.ResumeDialogue
member.summary: Resumes the dialogue if paused.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.StopDialogue
member.summary: Stop the dialogue and clear the active story.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.ContinueDialogue
member.summary: Call to continue the dialogue to the next line. Call this to move to the choices as well.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.ChooseChoice(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this to choose a choice.
member.param: Whether to automatically call Continue once choice is chosen.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.GetActiveDialogueStateSave
member.summary: Saves the current state of the active story.
member.returns: Returns the state of the story in JSON format.

member.name: M:FlaxInk.DialogueRunner.LoadActiveDialogueStateSave(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a save state of the active story.
member.param: The saved story state in JSON format.
